posts.post_content: We used to play this with [Goblin Bombardment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Bombardment) and [Fecundity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fecundity). There are much more interesting things to do now.

posts.post_content: You could have this be your only 4 drop, and then maybe have some nice 5-6 drops that he will pull out. Use spells to ramp your mana rather then creatures, and your in for some good games.

Posted By: TheWrathofShane (9/8/2012 1:10:08 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I play this in my [Jarad,](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jarad,) EDH deck and I use cards like [Disciple of Bolas](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disciple of Bolas) and [Momentous Fall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Momentous Fall) so I get a big hand, I also use [Scroll Rack](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scroll Rack) so then I can use my hand to alter my deck. I have a [Worldspine Wurm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Worldspine Wurm) in my hand, I tap 1, use the racks ability, draw a card and put my Wurm on the top of the deck, and sac Gamekeeper to get a worldspine wurm  
  
TL;DR: Deck manipulation + Big Creature + Gamekeeper = Power
posts.html:
I play this in my Jarad, EDH deck and I use cards like Disciple of Bolas and Momentous Fall so I get a big hand, I also use Scroll Rack so then I can use my hand to alter my deck. I have a Worldspine Wurm in my hand, I tap 1, use the racks ability, draw a card and put my Wurm on the top of the deck, and sac Gamekeeper to get a worldspine wurm

TL;DR: Deck manipulation + Big Creature + Gamekeeper = Power
